question: Match the following:

matches.left: All animals belonging to various phyla
matches.right: Assigned to the highest category called Kingdom Animalia
Comprises all plants from various divisions
Henceforth referred to as two groups

matches.left: Taxonomic categories from species to kingdom
matches.right: Shown in ascending order starting with species

answer: All animals belonging to various phyla–Assigned to the highest category called Kingdom Animalia, Kingdom Plantae–Comprises all plants from various divisions, Animal and plant kingdoms–Henceforth referred to as two groups, Taxonomic categories from species to kingdom–Shown in ascending order starting with species

question: Match the following:

matches.right: Have also developed sub-categories in this hierarchy
More are the characteristics that the members within the taxon share
Greater is the difficulty of determining the relationship to other taxa at the same level

answer: Taxonomists–Have also developed sub-categories in this hierarchy, Lower the taxa–More are the characteristics that the members within the taxon share, Higher the category–Greater is the difficulty of determining the relationship to other taxa at the same level, Problem of classification–Becomes more complex
